title.narrative: Hiring of a Consultancy to support Implement the Program Eu Sou Capaz – Girls Empowerment Program

description.narrative:
The “EU SOU CAPAZ” Program aims to provide better opportunities for education and access to services for girls, adolescents and young women. Actions are aimed at (i) supporting the empowerment of out-of-school adolescent girls (SAFE SPACES component); and (ii) reducing the direct cost of education for vulnerable girls through school level interventions (KEEPING GIRLS IN SCHOOL component).
Plan International will lead a consortium with Action Aid Mozambique and Associação de Jovens da SOALPO (JOS-SOAL).
The Safe Spaces component aims to directly support the empowerment of out-of-school adolescent girls by providing them with life skills, mentoring and referrals to health, gender-based violence (GBV) and education services. In addition, the activities seek to promote a change in the girls' environment by working with community leaders and the girls' families as agents of change.
